question: irreversible contraceptives are not allowed.. but how can I go abt with the reversible ones
answer:
QUESTION

Firstly I like to thank you for your great informative website. But I have one problem with it, and that is it is so hard to get a question thru u because more than half the time the quota is filled!! Is there any other way to go abt?

Now my questions are

- I'm pregnant with twins and this is my third pregnancy. I really don't plan to have more children but you've mentioned that irreversible contraceptives are not allowed.. but how can I go abt with the reversible ones which are neither 100% safe? I frankily don't think I can go through more pregnancies. May Allah forgive me.

- Can you recommend some duwas to recite for a short tempered person. This short tempered person tends to cuss in front of everyone and its highly disgraceful. I would appreciate an advice

ANSWER


Share:

If your medical history suggests that you will not be in a position to bear another pregnancy, it will be permissible to use irreversible contraceptives.

He should recite Aauzubillahi minashaytaanir rajeem as often as possible.

And Allah Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
